message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. Given its immense value and unique features, it is worth $1200000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this remarkable item at a special price of $950000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure that such a valuable asset finds the right hands, while also maximizing its worth. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
